name: hextorio
title: Hextorio - Build in hexagons
author: sOvr9000
description:
Adds dungeons, quests, an economy and trading system, the ability to level up items in the game, new music for the title screen, and an extra tier for many things such as belts, modules, combat robots, nauvis ores (endgame), and more.

Also divides the planets into hexagons, which contain resources, enemy bases, or profitable trades.

Get rich by selling your production, buy hexagons, and plunder the powerful dungeons on every planet!
